article_title: Mercy Health exec on revenue cycle best practices during an EHR installation
article_text:
The expense, complexity and clinical focus of an EHR installation often means that the transition of a hospital’s revenue cycle into the new system is given a low priority. But by addressing the revenue cycle first, healthcare organizations can establish a performance baseline for claims and revenue management. Not only that, they can pinpoint and fix anomalies in billing activity and financial performance.

Fred Morgan, senior director of physician patient accounting at Mercy Health Services, recently put together a presentation that details the RCM challenges Mercy Health Center encountered as it underwent an aggressive, 12-month installation of an Epic EHR system.

Advance to the next slide to see his presentation.
